tool.name: HMGM Transcript Correction
tool.description: Manual transcript correction by a human

param.name: input_transcript
param.label: Input AMP Speech to Text JSON file
param.help: JSON file for the transcript to be corrected

param.name: context_json
param.label: Human MGM Task Context
param.help: JSON string containing context information needed for creating Human MGM task

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
This is a human MGM that facilitates manual STT transcript correction by providing a human with the BBC transcript editor and HTML5 media player for the original media file. Note that, if the tool is run by a job submitted from AMPPD, the context parameter will be automatically generated by AMPPD; any user defined value will be overwritten.
